page.title: 09EDUCATION
page.content: {Knighton Church in Wales Primary {School}is the only school in Knighton. It used to be the Secondary School and in 1970 the children were moved to the Comprehensive School at Presteigne. The Primary School then moved in to the Secondary School buildings.The school has twelve classes,five nursery/infants classes,six junior classes and a class for children with special educational needs.The school has a swimming pool,a gymnasium,a large hall,craftrooms a canteen as well as classrooms.There is a large playground in front of the school and playing fields to the rear.The staff consists of the headmasterMr.D.Davies twelve teachers and two nursery assistants.Children at the age of eleven years transfer to John Beddoes School Presteigne and later to colleges and universities.
